about.description:
NVIDIA cuTensorNet is a high-performance GPU library for tensor network computations,
a component of the NVIDIA cuQuantum SDK.

The packages cuquantum, custatevec, and cutensornet are governed by the NVIDIA cuQuantum
Software License Agreement (EULA). By downloading and using the packages,
you accept the terms and conditions of the NVIDIA cuQuantum EULA -
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html
about.summary: cuTensorNet: A High-Performance Library for Tensor Network Computations

name: cutensornet
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.24.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: cutensornet
  version: 2.1.0
source:
  - sha256: 08b31e47adcfbdecad935589e3245a35ee7ee0886f1e8c745aca570213598790
    url: https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuquantum/redist/cuquantum/linux-x86_64/cuquantum-linux-x86_64-23.03.0.20-archive.tar.xz
  - sha256: 9ec936b7a730c9ee1651f8df3f5d720c7ab1a951e91aef65f7c81b027e52ec9f
    url: https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuQuantum/archive/refs/tags/v23.03.0.tar.gz
build:
  ignore_run_exports_from:
    - cuda-nvcc_linux-64 12.0.*
  missing_dso_whitelist: null
  number: 1
  post-link: post-link
  run_exports:
    - cutensornet >=2.1.0,<3.0a0 mpi_mpich_*
  script:
    - mkdir -p $PREFIX/include
    - mv include/cutensornet* $PREFIX/include/
    - mkdir -p $PREFIX/lib
    - mv lib/12/libcutensornet.so* $PREFIX/lib/
    - $GCC -shared -std=c11 -fPIC $CFLAGS -I$PREFIX/include distributed_interfaces/cutensornet_distributed_interface_mpi.c
      -L$PREFIX/lib -lmpi -o $PREFIX/lib/libcutensornet_distributed_interface_mpi.so
    - mkdir -p "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d"
    - cp "${RECIPE_DIR}/cutn-activate.sh" "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/cutn-activate.sh"
    - mkdir -p "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d"
    - cp "${RECIPE_DIR}/cutn-deactivate.sh" "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d/cutn-deactivate.sh"
  string: mpi_mpich_h9f53280_1
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - _sysroot_linux-64_curr_repodata_hack 3 h69a702a_13
    - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.39 he00db2b_1
    - binutils_linux-64 2.39 h5fc0e48_13
    - cuda-cccl_linux-64 12.0.90 ha770c72_1
    - cuda-cudart 12.0.107 h59595ed_5
    - cuda-cudart-dev 12.0.107 h59595ed_5
    - cuda-cudart-dev_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_5
    - cuda-cudart-static 12.0.107 h59595ed_5
    - cuda-cudart-static_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_5
    - cuda-cudart_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_5
    - cuda-driver-dev_linux-64 12.0.107 h59595ed_5
    - cuda-nvcc-dev_linux-64 12.0.76 ha770c72_0
    - cuda-nvcc-impl 12.0.76 h59595ed_0
    - cuda-nvcc-tools 12.0.76 h59595ed_0
    - cuda-nvcc_linux-64 12.0.76 hba56722_5
    - cuda-version 12.0 hffde075_2
    - gcc_impl_linux-64 12.2.0 hcc96c02_19
    - gcc_linux-64 12.2.0 h4798a0e_13
    - gxx_impl_linux-64 12.2.0 hcc96c02_19
    - gxx_linux-64 12.2.0 hb41e900_13
    - kernel-headers_linux-64 3.10.0 h4a8ded7_13
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.39 hcc3a1bd_1
    - libgcc-devel_linux-64 12.2.0 h3b97bd3_19
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libsanitizer 12.2.0 h46fd767_19
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-64 12.2.0 h3b97bd3_19
    - libstdcxx-ng 12.2.0 h46fd767_19
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17 h4a8ded7_13
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - cuda-nvrtc 12.0.76 h59595ed_1
    - cuda-version 12.0 hffde075_2
    - cutensor 1.7.0.1 hcb278e6_1
    - libcublas 12.0.1.189 hcb278e6_2
    - libcusolver 11.4.2.57 hcb278e6_1
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libgfortran-ng 12.2.0 h69a702a_19
    - libgfortran5 12.2.0 h337968e_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libnvjitlink 12.0.76 hcb278e6_1
    - libstdcxx-ng 12.2.0 h46fd767_19
    - mpi 1.0 mpich
    - mpich 4.1.1 h846660c_100
    - patchelf 0.17.2 h58526e2_0
  run:
    - __glibc >=2.17,<3.0.a0
    - cuda-version >=12.0,<13.0a0
    - cutensor >=1.7.0.1,<2.0a0
    - libcublas >=12.0.1.189,<13.0a0
    - libcusolver >=11.4.2.57,<12.0a0
    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - libstdcxx-ng >=12
    - mpich * external*
    - mpich >=4.1.1,<5.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - ./cutn_run_test.sh 23.03.0.20
    - echo $CUTENSORNET_COMM_LIB
    - test -n $CUTENSORNET_COMM_LIB
    - test -f $CUTENSORNET_COMM_LIB
  files:
    - cutn_run_test.sh
    - test_load_elf.c
  requires:
    - cuda-nvcc_linux-64 12.0.*
    - cuda-version 12.0.*
    - gcc_linux-64 12.*
    - git
    - gxx_linux-64 12.*
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.17.*
about:
  description: 'NVIDIA cuTensorNet is a high-performance GPU library for tensor network
    computations,

    a component of the NVIDIA cuQuantum SDK.


    The packages cuquantum, custatevec, and cutensornet are governed by the NVIDIA
    cuQuantum

    Software License Agreement (EULA). By downloading and using the packages,

    you accept the terms and conditions of the NVIDIA cuQuantum EULA -

    https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuQuantum
  doc_url: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cutensornet/index.html
  home: https://developer.nvidia.com/cuquantum-sdk
  license: LicenseRef-cuQuantum-Software-License-Agreement
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_url: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuquantum/license.html
  summary: 'cuTensorNet: A High-Performance Library for Tensor Network Computations'
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - DmitryLyakh
    - JeremyWangNVDA
    - leofang
    - mtjrider
    - yangcal
